word_json: {"wordRank":4,"headWord":"pericope","content":{"word":{"wordHead":"pericope","wordId":"GRE_2_4","content":{"sentence":{"sentences":[{"sContent":"You're going to pay really good attention to all the details of the pericope.","sContent_eng":"You're going to pay really good attention to all the details of the pericope.","sSpeech":"You%27re+going+to+pay+really+good+attention+to+all+the+details+of+the+pericope.&le=eng","sCn":"好好留意,选段的细节。"},{"sContent":"You want to concentrate on the details of your pericope to try to find out what the message is.","sContent_eng":"You want to concentrate on the details of your pericope to try to find out what the message is.","sSpeech":"You+want+to+concentrate+on+the+details+of+your+pericope+to+try+to+find+out+what+the+message+is.&le=eng","sCn":"你们需要注意选段的细节,发掘其中蕴含的信息。"}],"desc":"例句"},"usphone":"pə'rikəpi:","syno":{"synos":[{"pos":"n","tran":"（书籍、文章中的）章节；摘录","hwds":[{"w":"section"},{"w":"extract"}]}],"desc":"同近"},"ukphone":"pə'rɪkəpɪ","ukspeech":"pericope&type=1","star":0,"speech":"Pericope","usspeech":"pericope&type=2","trans":[{"tranCn":"(从书中选出的)章节, 选段","descOther":"英释","descCn":"中释","pos":"n","tranOther":"a selection from a book, esp a passage from the Bible read at religious services"}]}}},"bookId":"GRE_2"}
